result.execSummary:
The defendant Sarquice L Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sarquice L Johnson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court will consider motion for expungement IF defendant pays the fine and costs, completes the CCW class and has no further violations of the law raising to the level of probable cause.

Defendant Sarquice L Johnson in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

AS TO COUNT 1:

Court ordered defendant to pay $200.00 FINE inclusive of all applicable court costs and fees by October 24, 2016, or to be docketed as a civil judgment.
Court ordered defendant complete Carry Concealed Weapon class. 
.
Court will consider motion for expungement if defendant pays the fine and costs, completes the CCW class and has no further violations of the law raising to the level of probable cause.

Defendant Sarquice L Johnson in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for sentencing hearing. Attorney Danielle Shelton is unavailable for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 22, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sarquice L Johnson in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Defendant prepared to enter change of plea.  Hearing proceeded.  Negotiations set forth by the state.

COUNT 1:  The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum to Plea Questionnaire, and Jury Instructions received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.  Defense request for adjourned sentencing date granted.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sarquice L Johnson in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Agreed Upon Request For A New Court Date received and filed with court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Oral No Weapons Order  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 07-23-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Sarquice L Johnson in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.37  for a Pretrial Conference.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 7/14/15 @ 1:30pm
